CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 好的；优质的；良好的；令人满意的；可接受的；赞同的；合适的；（对…）有益的；有用的；有好处的；有效的；健康的；善良的；有道德的；符合道德的；可靠的；能干的；彻底的；（数量或程度）相当大的
优点；长处；利益；好处；好人；益处；用处；善行；美德；正义；高尚的人；有道德的人；合乎道德的行为；正直的行为；优质产品；真品

synonym.mean: 好的；优良的；愉快的；虔诚的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 感伤的；伪善的；假正经的
糖果；身份低微之老妇；吸引人的东西；伪君子
漂亮的；优秀的；相当多的

word_group.brief_definition: 状况良好；在良好状况下；良好状态

bilingual.target: 他是一个非常好的男孩。
好的篱笆造就好的邻居。
好的，祝你有美好的一天！
露西是个很好的倾听者。
贾米尔得了很好的分数。

list.abstract: good，英文单词，可作形容词、名词、副词，翻译为好的、好处、善良、善行等。
《good》是歌手Loco、Gray 、ELO演唱的一首歌曲，由Loco、Gray、ELO作词，Gray、ELO作曲，收录于专辑《GOOD》中。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, okay, good. You do that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，很好，那你去吧。

yingyinNormal.en: I think for me, it's not a good idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为对我来说，不是一个好的主意。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh. That's fine. Great. Okay, good for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系好的。太棒了，很好。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I do. I'm their teacher. Good for you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 嗯，我可以，我可是他们的老师。挺好的。

yingyinNormal.en: That'd be a good slogan for a condom company.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这对于套套公司来说真是绝好的广告词。

yingyinNormal.en: Alicia? Yeah. Uh, good. Uh, I'll talk to you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 艾丽西娅？我在听，好的，回头打给你。

yingyinNormal.en: Good. Because this job could take me all day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的。因为这份工作会花我一整天。

yingyinNormal.en: And you can choose the white. Very good, m'lord.
yingyinNormal.zh: 白酒你来选吧。 好的 ，老爷。

yingyinNormal.en: Whole thing worked out good for me. I'm walking.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这结果对我来说是好的。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm not running. Good. Then we have no disagreement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不会参选。好的，那我们就没有分歧了。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey, there is a perfectly good couch across the hall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，走廊对面有很好的沙发。

yingyinNormal.en: And that begins with thinking rationally. You understand? Good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这就需要你从理性思考开始，你听懂了吗？好的。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir Lancelot, ladies and gentlemen. Sir Lancelot. Yes! Very good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢送兰斯洛特爵士，女士们先生们。好的！非常好。
yingyinNormal.videoNameEn: 《Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb》

yingyinNormal.en: All right. How's it going so far? It's good. I'm good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，你还好吗？挺好的，我很好。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, good. Okay, good for you. Trying to recapture the magic.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还好，好的，很好，试着找回往日情怀。

yingyinNormal.en: Riley. Was I not a good child? You were a very good child. Am I not a good person? Get there. I believe I am entitled.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱丽——我不是个好孩子吗？你是个很好的孩子。我不是个好人吗？有话直说。我相信我有权利。

yingyinNormal.en: The kid's in good hands. We're sure he is. We trust you completely. Good night.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他会被照顾得很好的。我想也是，我们完全相信你，晚安您嘞。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, people, have a good day. We'll see you this afternoon. Have a good day, guys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的,今天也要过得开心哦，下午再见。祝你们过得愉快。

yingyinNormal.en: How do we determine what's good? In a democracy, good is a conversation, not a unilateral decision.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们如何决定什么才是好的？在民主世界，好是探讨出来的，而不是单方面决定的。

yingyinNormal.en: I was always a pretty good student. You were always the smartest student in the class. That's not good enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我过去一直是个很好的学生，你一直是班级里最聪明的学生，这些都还不够好。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 好的; 优质的; 好
善良的; 善举; (the~)好人; 正义
擅长的; 有能力的; 优点
合理的; 有说服力的
符合道德的; 正派的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 好；仁慈；美德；慷慨；德行；有益（或营养）成分

word_family.mean: adj. 合意的；满意的；合格的；胜任的；善的；有德行的；让人高兴的；令人愉快的；令人满意的；彻底的；天哪；啊呀

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 对...有良好的意识(或感觉)

sense_info_list.en: having the qualities required for a particular role
sense_info_list.zh: 好的; 优质的; 好

examination_example.sentence: Being a <highlight>good</highlight> parent is, of course, what every parent would like to be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，每个父母都想成为一个好父母。

examination_example.sentence: Every person is a really <highlight>good</highlight> book to read, or to have a conversation with!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每一个人都是一本真正值得读的好书，或者可以与之交谈的好书！

examination_example.sentence: After a spouse has been selected, each family investigates the other to make sure its child is marrying into a <highlight>good</highlight> family.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在选择配偶后，每个家庭都要调查对方，以确保自己的孩子嫁给一个好家庭。

sense_info_list.en: very satisfactory, pleasant, or interesting

examination_example.sentence: On a really <highlight>good</highlight> day, it no longer feels as if you're "making time to read," but just reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一个非常好的日子里，你不再觉得你在“挤出时间阅读”，而是只是在阅读。

examination_example.sentence: If you're in a period of change or just feeling stuck and in a rut, now may be a <highlight>good</highlight> time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你正处于一段改变的时期，或者只是感觉停滞不前，现在可能是一个好时机。

examination_example.sentence: You may have a circle of friends who provide constant <highlight>good</highlight> humor, help and companionship.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可能会有一群朋友，他们源源不断地给你带来好心情、帮助和陪伴。

sense_info_list.en: useful, advantageous, or beneficial in effect

examination_example.sentence: And regardless of transferability, the study shows that what's <highlight>good</highlight> for people may also be <highlight>good</highlight> for the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且不考虑可转移性，研究表明对人有益的东西也可能对环境有益。

examination_example.sentence: You lose your patience and say something that was a bit too harsh and does nobody any <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你失去了耐心并说一些太严厉的话，这对任何人都没有好处。

examination_example.sentence: It usually leads to no <highlight>good</highlight> — drinking, drugs and casual sex.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这通常不会带来什么好处——喝酒，毒品和滥交。

sense_info_list.zh: 善良的; 善举; (the~)好人; 正义

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Good</highlight> governance rests on an understanding of the inherent worth of each individual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 善政基于对每个人固有价值的理解。

examination_example.sentence: It has been available even in the most mundane of life situations to show you right from wrong, <highlight>good</highlight> from bad, friend from foe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使在最平凡的生活中，它也教你分辨对与错、善与恶、友与敌。

examination_example.sentence: And third, through a more diffuse "halo effect," whereby its <highlight>good</highlight> deeds earn it greater consideration from consumers and others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第三，通过更广泛的“光环效应”，该公司的善行能让消费者和其他人有购买需求时能更多地考虑该公司。

sense_info_list.en: skilled at doing or dealing with a specified thing
sense_info_list.zh: 擅长的; 有能力的; 优点

examination_example.sentence: I realized I was not <highlight>good</highlight> enough in this area to compete with other creative personalities in the future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我意识到我在这方面还不够好，将来无法与其他有创造力的人竞争。

examination_example.sentence: We have not been <highlight>good</highlight> at communicating the real value that housing can contribute to economic growth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们一直不善于传达住房对经济增长的真正价值。

examination_example.sentence: That is not something machines are <highlight>good</highlight> at.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这不是机器擅长的。

examination_example.sentence: Certain jobs have gone away for <highlight>good</highlight>, outmoded by machines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些工作已经永远消失了，被机器淘汰了。

examination_example.sentence: About a quarter of all Italian immigrants, for example, eventually returned to Italy for <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，大约四分之一的意大利移民最终永远回到了意大利。

examination_example.sentence: Leave their home countries for <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 永远地离开他们的祖国。

sense_info_list.zh: 合理的; 有说服力的

examination_example.sentence: The personal grievance provisions of New Zealand's Employment Relations Act 2000 (ERA) prevent an employer from firing an employee without <highlight>good</highlight> cause.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新西兰2000年雇佣关系法 (ERA) 中的个人申诉条款防止雇主在无正当理由的情况下解雇员工。

examination_example.sentence: There is a <highlight>good</highlight> reason why the UK is dominated by animal husbandry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 畜牧业在英国占主导地位是有充分理由的。

examination_example.sentence: But while this may be true, it's not a <highlight>good</highlight> enough reason to condemn gap years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这可能是真的，但这也不足以成为谴责间隔年的充分理由。

sense_info_list.en: great in number, amount or degree

examination_example.sentence: We humans count on forests to soak up a <highlight>good</highlight> share of the carbon dioxide we produce.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类指望森林吸收我们产生的大量二氧化碳。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Good</highlight>-paying jobs are less available.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高薪工作越来越少。

examination_example.sentence: Big majorities believe those "just getting started in life" face a tougher climb than earlier generations in reaching such signpost achievements as securing a <highlight>good</highlight>-paying job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绝大多数人认为，那些“刚刚开始生活”的人，在获得高薪工作等标志性成就方面，要比前几代人面临更艰难的攀登。

examination_example.sentence: Likewise, among the elderly, being somewhat overweight is often an indicator of <highlight>good</highlight> health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 同样，在老年人中，稍微超重往往是健康的一个指标。

sense_info_list.en: obedient to rules or conventions
sense_info_list.zh: 符合道德的; 正派的

examination_example.sentence: When companies get into trouble with the law, evidence of <highlight>good</highlight> character can win them a less costly punishment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当公司陷入法律困境时，良好品行的证据可以为企业赢得成本较低的惩罚。

sense_info_list.en: merchandise or possessions

examination_example.sentence: Make Your Print Newspaper a Luxury <highlight>Good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让你的印刷报纸成为奢侈品。

sense_info_list.en: pleasant to look at

exam_freq_info.chinese: 擅长的; 有能力的; 优点; 益处

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 好；仁慈；美德；慷慨；德行；有益（或营养）成分

word_family.mean: adj. 合意的；满意的；合格的；胜任的；善的；有德行的；让人高兴的；令人愉快的；令人满意的；彻底的；天哪；啊呀

sense_info_list.en: having the qualities required for a particular role

examination_example.sentence: Science has already done a <highlight>good</highlight> job of proving the results that follow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学已经很好地证明了接下来的结果。

examination_example.sentence: They might not have even reflected on what <highlight>good</highlight> management looks like and how it would influence their own management style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们甚至可能没有思考过什么是好的管理，以及它会如何影响他们自己的管理方式。

examination_example.sentence: We mistakenly think of "<highlight>good</highlight>" drawings as those which work as recreations of the real world, as realistic illusions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们错误地认为“好”的绘画是真实世界的再现，是现实的幻想。

sense_info_list.en: useful, advantageous, or beneficial in effect

examination_example.sentence: The findings challenged the idea that homework was "inherently <highlight>good</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些发现质疑了家庭作业“本质上是好的”的观点。

examination_example.sentence: They prove to be a <highlight>good</highlight> means for managers to give instructions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实证明，它们是管理者给出指示的好方法。

examination_example.sentence: It may do harm as well as <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它既有好处也有坏处。

sense_info_list.en: skilled at doing or dealing with a specified thing
sense_info_list.zh: 擅长的; 有能力的; 优点; 益处

examination_example.sentence: They get much <highlight>better</highlight> prepared for school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们为上学做了更好的准备。

examination_example.sentence: I am reminded of Abraham Lincoln's quote, "I don't like that man. I must get to know him <highlight>better</highlight>."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想起了亚伯拉罕·林肯的名言，“我不喜欢那个人。我必须进一步了解他。”

sense_info_list.en: obedient to rules or conventions
merchandise or possessions

examination_example.sentence: I got a throat infection and had to go to the hospital to get some antibiotics as I really wasn't getting any <highlight>better</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我喉咙感染了，不得不去医院拿些抗生素，因为我真的没有好转。

sense_info_list.en: pleasant to look at
showing kindness
possessing or displaying moral virtue
belonging or relating to a high social class
used to emphasize a following adjective

exam_freq_info.chinese: 符合标准的; 高质量的
擅长的; 有能力的; 优点; 益处

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 好；仁慈；美德；慷慨；德行；有益（或营养）成分

word_family.mean: adj. 合意的；满意的；合格的；胜任的；善的；有德行的；让人高兴的；令人愉快的；令人满意的；彻底的；天哪；啊呀

sense_info_list.en: having the qualities required for a particular role
sense_info_list.zh: 符合标准的; 高质量的

examination_example.sentence: He's a <highlight>good</highlight> friend of mine, and he would never try to pressure you or cheat you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他是我的好朋友，他永远不会强迫你或欺骗你。

examination_example.sentence: And my boyfriend's English is so <highlight>good</highlight> that we just basically speak English all the time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而且我男朋友的英语很好，我们基本上就是一直说英语。

examination_example.sentence: But they did much better after getting a <highlight>good</highlight> night's sleep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但他们在睡了一夜好觉后表现得好多了。

sense_info_list.en: skilled at doing or dealing with a specified thing
sense_info_list.zh: 擅长的; 有能力的; 优点; 益处

examination_example.sentence: Kids in play-based kindergartens "end up equally <highlight>good</highlight> or better at reading and other intellectual skills".
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游戏幼儿园的孩子“最终在阅读和其他智力技能方面同样优秀或更好”。

examination_example.sentence: He is not very <highlight>good</highlight> at socializing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他不太擅长社交。

examination_example.sentence: It will depend on what you want to get out of university, what you are <highlight>good</highlight> at and what you enjoy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这将取决于你想从大学里得到什么，你擅长什么，你喜欢什么。

sense_info_list.en: useful; advantageous; or beneficial in effect

examination_example.sentence: They think milk is <highlight>good</highlight> for health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们认为牛奶有益健康。

examination_example.sentence: But if we come up with an answer, robots could be <highlight>good</highlight> for humanity.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但如果我们能想出一个答案，机器人可能会对人类有好处。

examination_example.sentence: It is not <highlight>good</highlight> for students to play video games.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生玩电子游戏是不好的。

sense_info_list.en: obedient to rules or conventions

examination_example.sentence: At a young age, children usually don't have <highlight>good</highlight> judgement.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在很小的时候，孩子通常没有很好的判断力。

examination_example.sentence: There's a <highlight>good</highlight> explanation for the phenomenon in the book The Formula: The Universal Laws of Success by Albert Laszlo Barabasi.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Albert Laszlo Barabasi所著的《方案：成功的普遍法则》一书对这一现象有一个很好的解释。

examination_example.sentence: This is a green tax, which is designed to help clean up the island's natural environment, and with <highlight>good</highlight> reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种环保税，旨在帮助清理岛上的自然环境，而且理由充分。

examination_example.sentence: Exercise is more important to <highlight>good</highlight> health than diet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比起节食，锻炼对健康更重要。

examination_example.sentence: Students' beliefs about change are related to their ability to cope, succeed academically and maintain <highlight>good</highlight> mental health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 学生对变化的信念与他们的应对能力、学业成功和保持良好心理健康有关。

examination_example.sentence: They have a <highlight>good</highlight> understanding of evolution.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们对进化有很好的理解。

examination_example.sentence: Ancient philosophers strongly advise that we do <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 古代哲学家强烈建议我们行善。

examination_example.sentence: Instead, Soupios says, ancient wisdom urges us to do <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，索皮奥斯说，古老的智慧敦促我们做善事。

examination_example.sentence: The doer of a <highlight>good</highlight> deed can feel spiritually rewarded even when they gain no concrete benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 做好事的人即使没有得到具体的好处，也能获得精神上的回报。

sense_info_list.en: pleasant to look at
sufficient to pay for
merchandise or possessions

examination_example.sentence: If play and building are critical to 21st-century skill development, that's really <highlight>good</highlight> news.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果玩耍和培养对于发展21世纪的技能至关重要，那这就是好消息了。

word_usage.usage: I feel good./I feel well. 两者都可以讲。good意思全面，指身体、精神都很好。而well只指身体好，是形容词，意为“健康的”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 好；仁慈；美德；慷慨；德行；有益（或营养）成分

word_family.mean: adj. 合意的；满意的；合格的；胜任的；善的；有德行的；让人高兴的；令人愉快的；令人满意的；彻底的；天哪；啊呀

sense_info_list.en: having the qualities required for a particular role

examination_example.sentence: Motivation is what you need most to do a <highlight>good</highlight> job.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 动机是你做好一项工作最需要的东西。

examination_example.sentence: According to recent studies, the answer is a big YES, if the air quality in your camping area is <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据最近的研究，如果你露营地的空气质量良好的话，答案是特别肯定的。

examination_example.sentence: I am a <highlight>good</highlight> player now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我现在是一个好球员。

examination_example.sentence: Studies found that people who woke up early for exercise slept <highlight>better</highlight> than those who exercised in evening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究发现，早起锻炼的人比晚上锻炼的人睡得好。

sense_info_list.en: useful, advantageous, or beneficial in effect

examination_example.sentence: We all know that exercise is <highlight>good</highlight> for us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们都知道，运动对我们有好处。

examination_example.sentence: This is a <highlight>good</highlight> chance for anyone who wants to learn how to do comedy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对于任何想学习喜剧的人来说，这都是一个很好的机会。

examination_example.sentence: Everyone knows that fish is <highlight>good</highlight> for health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人人都知道鱼有益健康。

examination_example.sentence: Visiting an apple event is a <highlight>good</highlight> chance to see, and often taste, a wide variety of apples.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在苹果节人们可以看到，并常常能尝到各种各样的苹果。

sense_info_list.en: used to emphasize a following adjective

examination_example.sentence: His constructions filled a shelf in the art classroom and a <highlight>good</highlight> part of his bedroom at home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的作品占据了艺术教室的一个书架和家里卧室的很大一部分。

examination_example.sentence: People who frequent cultural places or participate in artistic events are more likely to gain <highlight>good</highlight> health compared to those who do not.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经常去文化场所或参加艺术活动的人比不经常去的人更有可能获得健康。

examination_example.sentence: One was that I was amazed at the fact that a sick person could feel much <highlight>better</highlight> after seeing a doctor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其一，我对病人在看完医生后感觉好多了感到惊讶。

examination_example.sentence: I don't feel <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我觉得不舒服。

examination_example.sentence: Safety regulations-not to mention the modern sports fan's desire for a <highlight>good</highlight> view and a comfortable seat-tend to keep stadium capacities (容量) lower.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，安全规定—更不用说现代体育迷对良好视野和舒适座位的渴望了—使得体育场的容量下降了。

examination_example.sentence: Do you want to get up in time to have breakfast with your family, or just be <highlight>better</highlight> prepared for your day?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你是想及时起床和家人一起共进早餐，还是想为你的一天做更充分的准备？

examination_example.sentence: If you have a door to your office, make <highlight>good</highlight> use of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你的办公室有一扇门，好好利用它。

sense_info_list.en: possessing or displaying moral virtue

examination_example.sentence: We prefer to describe emotional intelligence as a specific set of skills that can be used for either <highlight>good</highlight> or bad purposes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们倾向于将情商描述为一组特定的技能，这些技能既可以用于好的目的，也可以用于坏的目的。

examination_example.sentence: After a serious flu outbreak wipes out 99.4% of the world's population, a battle unfolds between <highlight>good</highlight> and evil among those let.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一场严重的流感爆发，摧毁了世界上99.4%的人口，一场正义与邪恶的战争就此展开。

examination_example.sentence: Small talk is the basis of <highlight>good</highlight> manners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 闲聊是礼貌的基础。

sense_info_list.en: skilled at doing or dealing with a specified thing

examination_example.sentence: He felt he was <highlight>good</highlight> at acting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他觉得自己擅长演戏。

examination_example.sentence: They are particularly <highlight>good</highlight> at both music and art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们特别擅长音乐和艺术。

examination_example.sentence: All of a sudden, I started making money because I was really <highlight>good</highlight> at math.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 突然之间，我开始赚钱了，因为我真的很擅长数学。

sense_info_list.en: sufficient to pay for

examination_example.sentence: You should have a <highlight>good</highlight> command (掌握) of either English or French.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你应该掌握好英语或法语。

examination_example.sentence: It's one of the best-rated hostels in the city, and for <highlight>good</highlight> reason.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是这个城市最受欢迎的旅馆之一，这是有充分理由的。

examination_example.sentence: The salary is usually <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 薪资通常都不错。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Good</highlight> evening, everybody.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大家晚上好。

examination_example.sentence: So far so <highlight>good</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 目前为止，一切顺利。

examination_example.sentence: Here's the <highlight>good</highlight> news.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有个好消息。

sense_info_list.en: pleasant to look at

examination_example.sentence: Nielsen always felt he should be doing comedy but his <highlight>good</highlight> looks and distinguished voice kept him busy in dramatic roles.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Nielsen一直觉得他应该演喜剧，但他英俊的外表和出众的嗓音让他忙于演戏剧角色。

word_usage.usage: I feel good./I feel well. 两者都可以讲。good意思全面，指身体、精神都很好。而well只指身体好，是形容词，意为“健康的”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 合适的; 令人满意的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 好；仁慈；美德；慷慨；德行；有益（或营养）成分

word_family.mean: adj. 合意的；满意的；合格的；胜任的；善的；有德行的；让人高兴的；令人愉快的；令人满意的；彻底的；天哪；啊呀

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 状况良好；在良好状况下；良好状态
良好秩序；良好的秩序；秩序良好
好闻；闻起来味道好；闻起来很香

examination_example.sentence: Have you done the necessary work to get <highlight>good</highlight> marks?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你做了必要的工作以取得好成绩了吗？

examination_example.sentence: Now they can make <highlight>good</highlight> forecasts for about two weeks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，他们可以对未来两周做出良好的预测。

examination_example.sentence: Doctors say too much stress is not <highlight>good</highlight> for children’s development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生说压力太大对孩子的发展不利。

examination_example.sentence: If you want to have <highlight>good</highlight> friends, you should be a <highlight>good</highlight> friend yourself first.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想拥有好朋友，你首先要成为好朋友。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Good</highlight> friendships have developed easily and friends make life better.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 好的友谊很容易发展，朋友让生活更美好。

examination_example.sentence: What made the writer and Tom become <highlight>good</highlight> friends?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 是什么使作者和汤姆成为好朋友的？

examination_example.sentence: Did you have a <highlight>good</highlight> time in Shanghai?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你在上海玩得开心吗？

examination_example.sentence: You can’t imagine what a <highlight>good</highlight> time we had working together on the project.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你无法想象我们在这个项目上一起工作有多愉快。

examination_example.sentence: Little Mary says <highlight>good</highlight> night to her parents before she goes to bed every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 小玛丽每天睡觉前都对父母说晚安。

examination_example.sentence: If you are <highlight>good</highlight> at drawing, try making special cards.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你擅长画画，试着做一些特别的卡片。

examination_example.sentence: It helps us remember the importance of our ears and encourages us to take <highlight>good</highlight> care for them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它帮助我们记住耳朵的重要性，并鼓励我们好好保护它们。

sense_info_list.zh: 合适的; 令人满意的

examination_example.sentence: Or maybe now is a <highlight>good</highlight> day to clean up?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 或者也许现在是清理打扫的好日子？

word_usage.usage: good，well的比较级是better，最高级是best，属于比较级和最高级的不规则变化。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 作形容词，意为“好的”，通常用来修饰名词。
作副词，意为“好地”，通常用来修饰副词；还可以作形容词，但只表示“身体好的”。
